question: Ikuphi okulandelayo okungavezi umbono we-technological determinism?
answer_list: Umthelela wezobuchwephese ezinomthelalela ngayo emphakathini ziyalawuleka
reasoning:
Iphassage ichaza inkolelo ye-technological determinism, ichaza ukuthi umbono we-technological determinism uthi ukuthuthuka kwezobuchwepheshe kuholela futhi kunquma izinguquko emphakathini ngokwemvelo, ngaphandle kokunakwa izimo zenhlalo ezifana namasiko noma ezepolitiki. Lokhu kuziveza ngokuthi izobuchwepheshe "zinethonya" emiphakathini "ngokwemvelo, kunangezimo zenhlalo." Ngakho-ke, imibono efana nokuthi ukuthuthuka kwezobuchwepheshe akuxilanga izinto zamasiko noma ezepolitiki, iyahambisana nombono we-technological determinism.

Kodwa-ke, inketho ethi «Umthelela wezobuchwephese ezinomthelalela ngayo emphakathini ziyalawuleka» akuhambisani nombono we-technological determinism ngoba le nkolelo iveza ukuthi umthelela wezobuchwepheshe ungalawulwa, okusho ukuthi kunomthelela wezinye izimo ezingaphezu kwobuchwepheshe kuphela. Lokhu ukuphikisana nokuqinile kombono we-technological determinism ongathi ubuchwepheshe buholwa yizimiso zesayensi kuphela futhi bumisa indlela emphakathini.

Ngakho-ke, inketho ethi umthelela wezobuchwepheshe "uyalawuleka" akubonisi umbono we-technological determinism futhi iyona ephikisana nombono ovezwe ephassaji.

question: Ikuphi okulandelayo okubonisa ukuthi okuqukhethwe imibono akuxilanga kulokhu?

reasoning:
Umbuzo ubuza ukuthi iyiphi inketho ekhombisa ukuthi okuqukethwe kwemibono akuxilanga kulokho okuxoxwe ngakho. Esihlokweni, kuvezwa ukuthi imibono igxile ezintweni ezishukumisa abantu ezifana nezidingo kanye nezifiso zangaphakathi, kanye nokuthi izinto ezizungeze umuntu zingathinta indlela abenza ngayo izinto. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izinketho ezifana no "Kubonisa ukuthi okuzungeze umuntu kungathinta izinto zakhe," "Izidingo zangaphakathi," kanye "Nokuqonda ukuthi abantu bathandani" kuyahambisana nezimfundiso ezishukumisayo ezifakwa endimeni njengoba kuchaziwe esihlokweni.

Ngakho-ke inketho elungile ezobonisa ukuthi okuqukethwe kwemibono akushiwo nokuxilanga ngalokho okuqukethwe yi "Izifiso ezintsha ezithuthuka phakathi nobudala" ngoba le nketho iphakamisa ukuthi kunezinguquko eziqhubekayo ezingakhombisi ukubanjwa okulolonga nje kuphela.

passage: "I-MRI isuselwa esenzakalweni sesayensi esibizwa nge-nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), eyatholwa ngawo-1930 ngu-Felix Bloch (owayesebenza eNyuvesi yase-Stanford) kanye no-Edward Purcell (waseNyuvesi yase-Havard). Iminyaka emine kamuva incwadi yemvume yanikezwa, okwakuyincwadi yemvume yokuqala emhlabeni enikezwe enkundleni yeMRI. Ngo-1977, uDkt. Damadian waqeda ukwakha iskena se-MRI ""somzimba ophelele"", asibiza ngokuthi “Esingenakunqotshwa”."
question: Ubani owathola i-nuclear magnetic resonance?
reasoning: Isisho esithi "i-nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), eyatholwa ngawo-1930 ngu-Felix Bloch (owayesebenza eNyuvesi yase-Stanford) kanye no-Edward Purcell (waseNyuvesi yase-Havard)" siveza ngokusobala ukuthi i-NMR yatholwa ngabaningi, uFelix Bloch no-Edward Purcell. passage: Uma uthatha uhambo oluya ezweni elisathuthuka okokuqala – noma engxenyeni entsha yomhlaba – ungadeleli ukushaqeka ngenxa yesiko okungaba khona. question: Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungabalwanga njengento ongachitha imali yakho eningi kukho lapho ujwayele amazwe asathuthuka?
answer_list: Umatrasi noma into enjengesipontshi uma uzokhempa
reasoning:
Kulesi sigaba sombhalo sithi: "Ungalali kumatilasi noma endwangwini entofontofo phansi ezindaweni ongazi kuzo izilwane zendawo. Uma uzoya ukuyokhempa ngaphandle, woza ne-camp cot noma ne-hammock ukuze uzivikele ezinyokeni, ofezela nokunye okucishe kufane." Lokhu kusho ukuthi umatasa noma isipontshi (camp cot noma hammock) akumele uchithe imali enkulu kukho, ngoba kubhekiswe ekuphepheni okumele ube nakho uma ukhempa ngaphandle, hhayi njengento ongachitha imali eningi kuyo njengokudla, izinkonzo noma amahhotela asezingeni eliphezulu. Ngakho-ke, inkinga yombuzo ithi "yikuphi okungabalwanga njengento ongachitha imali yakho eningi kuyo." Izimpendulo ngokudla okukhethekile wasentshonalanga, izinkonzo ezisezingeni eliphezulu, namahhotela asezingeni eliphezulu zonke zikhuluma ngezinto okumele uchithe imali eningi kuzo ukuze ujwayele indawo entsha. Kodwa umatasa noma isipontshi umane ulethelwa ukuphepha kokulala futhi akufanele kube yinto ongachitha imali eningi kuyo.

Ngakho-ke impendulo efanele yilowo okhomba izinto ongachithi imali eningi kuzo lapho ujwayele amazwe asathuthuka, okuyi-"Umatrasi noma into enjengesipontshi uma uzokhempa."

question: Ngokuya kwalomusho, ikuphi okulandelayo okukholelwa abantu abathile?
answer_list: Abantu ngeke bakwazi ukubona imihlaba ekhona
Kunama miles angaphansi kwayi-trillion phakathi nezinkanyezi
reasoning:
Umusho othi "Abanye bayazibuza ukuthi kunani lapha phezulu abanye bakholelwa ukuthi abantu bakwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila zingaphila kwelinye ipulanethi" ukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi abantu abathile bakholelwa ukuthi kunokuphila kwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila eminye iminhlabathini. Lokhu kuhlanganisa imizwa yokukholwa ekubeni bukhona ukuphila kwezinye izinhlobo ezingezona ezaseMhlabeni. Amanye amaqembu abantu baphupha ngesikhathi lapho beyokwazi ukuvakashela izinkanyezi futhi babone imihlaba enamazinga eziphila kulo.

Izinketho eziyisisekelo:
- Inketho 1 (Abantu bahambe babona izinkanyezi) ayichazwanga ngokugcwele emushweni njengoba kusho ukuthi lokhu mhlawumbe akwenzeki okwamanje.
- Inketho 2 (Abantu ngeke bakwazi ukubona imihlaba ekhona) ayisekelwa ngoba kushilo ukuthi abanye bayaphupha bakwazi ukuyibona.
- Inketho 3 (Ukuphila kukhona ngenxa yezinye izitshalo) akukhulumi ngqo ngumbhalo.
- Inketho 4 (Kunama miles angaphansi kwayi-trillion phakathi nezinkanyezi) kushoyo ngobude obuphakathi kwezinkanyezi, hhayi ngezimfundiso zabantu.

Ngakho, inketho efanele ikhombisa ukholelwa kwabanye ebukhoneni bokuphila kwamanye amapulanethi, okwenzeka ku-Option 1 kungekho, ngakho eyahluka kakhulu kunazo zonke ukuthi "Abantu bahambe babona izinkanyezi" - lokhu akuboniswanga njengento abantu abakholelwa kuyo njengamanje.

Kunoma yikuphi, umusho ogcwele ukhombisa ikakhulukazi ukuthi abanye bakholelwa ekutheni kungaba khona ukuphila kwelinye ipulanethi, okungasuselwa esigabeni sokuqala somusho: "abanye bayazibuza ukuthi kunani lapha phezulu abanye bakholelwa ukuthi abantu bakwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila zingaphila kwelinye ipulanethi."

Noma kunjalo, njengoba inketho 3 ithi "Ukuphila kukhona ngenxa yezinye izitshalo" ayiqondakali kahle futhi ingaphandle, futhi inketho 4 ikhuluma ngendawo phakathi kwezinkanyezi engaxhumene nokukholwa kwabantu, inketho efanele kakhulu ngokusekelwe kulokho abanye abakholwayo kuwukuthi "Abantu bahambe babona izinkanyezi" akuyena inketho efanele ngoba kusho ukuthi kusebenza njengengoko okwenzeka manje (engakushiwo emushweni) kodwa ukusho okuthile okubanjwe ngesikhathi esizayo noma ukholelwa ekutheni kungenzeka (hhayi okwamanje).

Ngaphinde ngibheke futhi: Inketho 1 isho abantu "behamba babona izinkanyezi" okubonakala sengathi kuyisenzo esiphilayo kodwa umusho uthi kunabantu abaphupha ngalokhu, akusho ukuthi bakholelwa kweqiniso. Okuthi "abanye bakholelwa ukuthi abantu bakwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila zingaphila kwelinye ipulanethi" kusho isenzo sokukholwa.

Ngakho-ke, inketho ehambelana nokukholwa kwabantu abathile yilena echaza ukholelwa ekutheni "Abantu bakwamanye amapulanethi noma ezinye izinhlobo zokuphila zingaphila kwelinye ipulanethi," lokhu kufana kakhulu nenketho 3 njengokukhuluma ngezinye izitshalo (ukuphila), okulekelela le nkolelo. Noma kunjalo, le nketho icabanga "ukuphila kukhona ngenxa yezinye izitshalo" okuyiphutha kancane, ngoba isho "nezinye izitshalo" (izitshalo njengamatshe) kodwa umusho uwuyiqiniso kangcono ngemibono yokukhona kwesinye ukuphila kwezinye izinhlobo emapulanethini angaphandle.

Ngakho-ke inketho elungile kakhulu eseduze nencazelo yomusho yi-Option 3, ngoba ikhuluma ngokukholwa kokuphila okungenzeka kwenye indawo (izitshalo lapha zingahunyushwa njengesimo sokuphila), kanti ezinye izinketho azihambisani kahle nalokho okubhalwe emushweni.

question: Ngokwalolu lwazi olulandelayo kule ndaba, yiziphi izinto ezinikezwayo lezo izivakashi zasehhotela ezingase zingakubheki njengokusemqoka?
answer_list: Ifanisha yasendulo egcwele kuso sonke isakhiwo
reasoning:
Kulesi sigaba, kuchazwa ukuthi amanye amahhotela asezikhathini zasendulo, ayengokuchuma kwezitimela nemikhumbi. Le ndaba iveza ukuthi la mahhotela ayenokuhla okuphambili nezenzakalo zasebusuku, kodwa ayikhulumi ngokuphelele ngezindawo zokudla ezinompheki ovelele noma amagumbi angabizi. Uqhakambisa izimpawu zamahhotela endulo njengezakudala zokugqoka nokuphila kobubona, nesikhala sokuhlala iziphathimandla nezikhulu. Lokhu kusikisela ukuthi izivakashi ezingaba nezidingo zesimanjemanje ezifana nendawo yokudla enompheki ovelele noma amagumbi angabizi zingase zingawabheki lawo mahhotela njengezindawo ezifanele. Ngakho-ke into engekho phambili kule ndaba, noma engenziwa njengokungabalulekile yileyo endaweni yokudla enompheki ovelele kanye namagumbi angabizi.

Kulungile-ke, ngokwamazwi nezincazelo ezisencwadini, inkomba ethi "Indawo yokudla enompheki ovelele" kanye "Amagumbi angabizi" akucatshangwanga njengento ebalulekile kulezi zindawo ezindala. Kodwa-ke, indawo yokuphumula enemnandi basebusuku iyakhuluma ngokuqondile ngezenzakalo zasebusuku ezikhuluma ngazo. Ukufanisa yasendulo nakho kugxilwe kakhulu esakhiweni, okusobala ukuthi kubalulekile.

Ngakho-ke, phakathi kwezinhlaka ezinikeziwe, into engase ingabi ngaphakathi kokubhekwa njengezinto ezisemqoka ukuthi "Indawo yokudla enompheki ovelele" kanye "Amagumbi angabizi". Kodwa-ke, kusukela ekukhetheni okukodwa, okusemthethweni okucacile nokuqondile endimeni yomlando namagama asezigabeni, impendulo eyiqiniso kakhulu umaki "Amagumbi angabizi" ngoba leyo ayikhulumi ngayo ngokuqondile noma ngezimpawu zamahhotela amadala.

passage: I-Jardín de la Unión. Lesi sikhala sakhiwa njengegceke lesonto ngekhulu le-17, lapho i-Templo de San Diego eyisakhiwo esasindayo kuphela. question: Ngokwale ndaba, yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungatholakali eJardín de la Unión?
reasoning:
Umsuka wombuzo ubuza ukuthi yini engatholakali eJardín de la Unión ngokwe ndaba enikeziwe. Kulesi sikhala, kuchazwe ukuthi iJardín de la Unión iyindawo eyayiyigceke lesonto ngekhulu le-17, inendawo yokudlela ezungeze ingadi, nezindawo lapho kuyakhonjiswa khona amakhonsathi amahhala ngesikhathi sasekhohlela nasentambama. Futhi kucacisiwe ukuthi inezinto eziningi ezenzekayo emini nasebusuku. Izingxenye ezingatholakali eJardín de la Unión, ngokuyisisekelo, yilokho okushiwoyo ngokwezinye izinto. Ukuqhathanisa izinketho:

1) "Izindawo ezimaphakathi zamatende ezinekhonsathi" – Kusho khona amakhonsathi avame ukunikezwa kusukela etendeni eliyinhloko; ngakho-ke lokhu kuyatholakala.

2) "Indawo enezindaba zothando zakudala" – Lolu hlobo lwendaba luhambisana nomugqa we-Callejon del Beso, kodwa le ndawo ayingeyeyo eJardín de la Unión, kepha ireferensi ehlukile.

3) "Izingadi ezibheke izindawo zokudla" – Kusho ukuthi kunezitolo zokudlela ezizungeze ingadi; lokhu kuyatholakala.

4) "Isakhiwo esidala esinezinto zamasonto" – Kukhulunywe ngesakhiwo esidala se-Templo de San Diego, kodwa kwatholakala ukuthi lesi sakhiwo sasibhekene nalelo gceke lesonto kodwa manje iJardín de la Unión ayisona isonto kodwa yisigcawu sesidlo sedolobha. Le ndawo ayisho ukuthi kunezakhiwo zamasonto njengamanje, kuyilapho iTemplo de San Diego kungaba yodwa nje leso sakhiwo.

Ngakho-ke, into engatholakali eJardín de la Unión yilesi sakhiwo esidala esinezinto zamasonto (okulingana nenketho 4). Le ndaba ikhuluma ngegceke langaphambilini lesonto kodwa manje ayisona leso sikhathi esinamuhla.

question: Yisiphi kulezi zitatimende ezingakuchazi ngokunembile lokho okwenzeka ngesikhathi kuphahlazeka indiza CG4684?

reasoning:

Isimo sezulu esibi sasithikameza ukuthungatha, okuphakamisa ukuthi isimo sezulu sathinta indawo yokuphahlazeka futhi sathinta ukuzama kokuhlika kwendiza.

Zonke ezinye izitatimende ziyahambisana nombhalo: indiza ayikwazanga ukuhlala phansi ngenxa yesimo sezulu (isimo sezulu esibi sisho ukuthi kunzima ukuhlika), indiza yaphahlazeka endaweni ekude (indawo yesehlakalo ayifinyeleleki kalula), nendawo yokwesekwa indiza bephazamiseke isimo sezulu.

question: Ngokwale ndaba, iziphi izinkinga ezilandelayo engaze kungaxoxwa ngayo ekuqeqeshweni okusezingeni eliphezulu noma ezincwadini?
reasoning: Kule ndaba, kucacisiwe ukuthi ukuqeqeshwa okukhethekile okukhethekile kuthatha izinsuku ezimbalwa futhi kuhlanganisa imidlalo yokulingisa, insiza yezimo eziphuthumayo, nokuqeqeshwa ekusebenziseni izikhali. Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi izinkinga ezixoxwa ngazo ekuqeqeshweni ezingeni eliphezulu zihlanganisa ukudlala izindima (imidlalo yokulingisa), ukuhlola izimo eziphuthumayo, nokulungela ukusebenzisa izikhali. Ngaphezu kwalokho, kusobala ukuthi izincwadi ezikhuluma ngezindawo zezimpi zimbalwa, okuveza ukuthi ukulungela izindawo ezinempi kuyisihloko esibalulekile ekuqeqeshweni. Kodwa-ke, izinkinga ezifana nokukwazi ukusinda endle noma ukulungela ukusebenzisa into yosizo lokuqala azizwakali sengathi ziyizihloko ezisemqoka kule ndaba njengalokho okulotshiwe. question: Ngokusho kwesiqephu, iluphi uhlelo oluvumela ama-atomu asuse amandla amanengi angadingekile emhlanyweni?
reasoning:
Isiqephu sichaza ukuthi ukuze ama-athomu abuyele ezingeni lawo lamandla langaphambili, kumelwe asuse amandla angeziwe awatholile ekukhanyeni ngokukhipha inhlayiyana yokukhanya ebizwa "nge-photon". Le nqubo ibizwa ngokuthi "ukukhishwa kwemisebe okushukumisiwe" ngoba ukukhishwa kwe-photon kubangela ukukhishwa kwemisebe. Ngakho-ke, uhlelo oluvumela ama-athomu asuse amandla amaningi angadingekile emhlanyweni wawo yilokho okukhipha ama-Photon, okuwukukhishwa kwemisebe kwe-photon.

Kuzo zonke izinketho ezikhona:
- "Imisebe" (Okungukukhanya ngokujwayelekile),
- "Ukunyaka kwama-photons" (akuyona into echaziwe),
- "ama-Photon" (ama-photon ngamunye akhishwa ukuze asuse amandla),
- "Ukunyaka kwemisebe" (akuchazwanga esiqephuni).

Izwi elichazayo nelimisiwe esiqephuni ukusetshenziswa kwe-"ama-Photon" ukuze ama-athomu akhiphe amandla angeziwe, ngakho impendulo elungile yi "ama-Photon".

question: Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuwuthetho weWorld Fair noma i-International Exposition?

reasoning:

Ngakho-ke, kungaqondakala ukuthi ulimi lukhomba ukuthi le mibukiso "ngokuvamile ithatha esikhathini esiphakathi kwezinyanga ezintathu kanye neziyisithupha" futhi lokhu isitatimende sobuthakathaka kanye nembuyiselo eqondile yokuthi "Imibukiso kufanele ithathe izinyanga eziyisithupha" (inketho 3) ingafana kakhulu nalesi sihloko. ezinye izinketho azifakazeleki ngokuqondile:

- Inketho 4 ithi wonke amazwe kufanele abambe iqhaza, engaphathwanga ngokusobala futhi ayiphumelelanga kule ndatshana.

Ngakho-ke, inketho 3 "Imibukiso kufanele ithathe izinyanga eziyisithupha" iyona efanele kakhulu njengoba iqukethe khona emiqondweni yomusho ngokuthi imibukiso ithatha isikhathi phakathi kwezinyanga ezintathu kuya kweziyisithupha.

question: I-NextGen izuzisa kanjani ngokuqondile ukulawula umoya we-traffic?

question: Phakathi nenkulumo, utheni uSteve Jobs nge-Apple mayelana nokwenziwa futhi?

Lokhu kusho ukuthi inkulumo yakhe igxile ekwenzeni ngenye indlela ifoni, okubaluleke kakhulu ekwenzeni umlando. Ngokusho kwakhe, ukuzama kwakhe ukwenza ifoni entsha kuzoholela ekwenzeni umlando. Ngakho-ke, into ayikhuluma kakhulu ngayo ngokwenzeka yinkampani i-Apple ngefoni yabo entsha, futhi le nto ephawulekayo ngokuba "umlando." passage: Enye yezindlela eziningi kwezivamile ezisentshenziswa ukuchaza ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nabanye ukusondelana nabambalwa ezinganeni, okwathi ngokunganakwa, ngeshwa, noma ngokuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu, bangajwayelaniswa nabantu abadala ngesikhathi besakhula. Izingane ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi “zinobulwane” noma ezasendle. Ezinye izingane ezinobulwane zigcinwe abanye abantu (ngokuvamile abazali bazo); kwezinye izimo lokhu kulahlwa kwezingane kwakungenxa yokungamukeli komzali ukukhubazeka okukhulu ngokwengqondo noma ngokomzimba kwengane. Izingane ezinobulwane kungenzeka ukuthi zihlangabezane nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane okubi noma ukucindezeleka ngaphambi kokulahlwa noma ukubaleka. Ezinye kuthiwa zikhuliswe izilwane; ezinye kuthiwa zihlale endle zizodwa. Lapho ikhuliswe ngokuphelele isilwane ekungesona umuntu, ingane enobulwane iveza ukuziphatha (ngokulinganiselwa okungokoqobo) cishe okufana ngokuphele nokwesilwane ebesiyinakekela, njengokusaba noma ukungabi nandaba nabantu.

question: Iziphathimandla zithembe ini ngenxa yezikhukhula?

reasoning:

Lokhu kubangelwa "ukukhishwa kwemisebe okushukumisiwe," lapho ama-athomu ashukunyiswa ukukhanya okukhanyayo okubangela ukukhishwa kwe-photon. Ngakho-ke, i-athomu ikhipha i-photon ngenxa yokuthi ikhishwa amandla angeziwe ayitholayo ekukhanyeni, njengoba ibuyela emazingeni ayo wangaphambilini wamandla. Lokhu kuhambelana nenketho ethi "Ukukhipha amandla amakhulu angadingeki."

Izinketho ezi-2, 3, no-4 azihambisani ngqo nalokho okushiwo umbhalo mayelana nesizathu sokukhishwa kwe-photon.

Ngakho-ke impendulo efanele yi-1.

question: Ngokusho kwesiqephu, i-GDP yeChina ingayidlula nini i-GDP yase United States?
reasoning:
Isiqephu sithi "I-GDP yaseShayina ingaba nkulu kuneyaseMelika emashumini amabili eminyaka." Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-GDP yeChina ingadlula i-GDP yase-US phakathi neminyaka engamashumi amabili (ama-20 years). Kuyo yonke imisho, ayikho enye inkomba engasho noma engahle ifanekise ukuthi kungenzeka lokhu kwenzeke ngaphansi kweminyaka engaphansi kwale mikhulu, futhi asikho isigaba esisho ukuthi lokhu kuzokwenzeka ngaphansi komholi omusha noma eminyakeni eyishumi nambili. Ngakho-ke impendulo efanele kakhulu ngokusekelwe kulokho okushiwo esiqephuni yilesi esithi "Phakathi neshumi leminyaka amathathu", okusho phakathi kweminyaka engamashumi amabili (20 years).

Ngakho, yize inketho yesine isho "Phakathi neshumi leminyaka amathathu" (ngisho eminyakeni engamashumi amathathu), isiqephu sisho emashumini amabili eminyaka, okuyiminyaka engaphezu kwayishumi nambili kodwa ngaphansi kwamashumi amathathu.

Ngakho inketho yesine "Phakathi neshumi leminyaka amathathu" (in the next thirty years) iyona enhle kakhulu futhi ifaneleka njengoba isiqephu sisho "emashumini amabili eminyaka" (in twenty years), elingana ngaphakathi kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu.

Izinombolo zezinketho:
1 - Ukulandela ukulungiswa komnotho (Following economic reform) akusho ukuqagela isikhathi.
2 - Phakathi neshumi leminyaka amabili (Within the next twelve years), akukhulunywanga ngqo esiqephuni.
3 - Uma izwe lingaphansi komholi omusha (If the country is under a new leader) akusho lutho mayelana nesikhathi.
4 - Phakathi neshumi leminyaka amathathu (Within the next thirty years) kuyahambisana nokuqanjwa kweminyaka engamashumi amabili eminyaka.

Ngakho, impendulo yile 4.

reasoning:

question: Kunini lapho kungekona ukuhlakanipha ukusebenzisa ucingo lwesatellite kuneselula?
answer_list: Lapho ulayini wesatellite ungase uvimbeke khona
Lapho uhambo luzodinga nibe nedata ethile
reasoning:
Umusho othi "Ifoni ye-satellite ngokuvamile ayithatheli ifoni ephathwayo indawo, njengoba kudingeka ube ngaphandle uqondene nesiphuphutheki ukuze ushaye ucingo" ukhombisa ukuthi ukusebenzisa ifoni yesatellite kuhlobene nokuba ngaphandle futhi uqondene nokubheka isiphuphutheki. Lokhu kusho ukuthi akuhlakaniphi ukusebenzisa ucingo lwesatellite lapho kungaphandle futhi kudinga ukuba sesimweni esithile, futhi kunezimo lapho kungadingeki khona. Kodwa umusho "Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefoni esebenzayo, ifoni yesiphuphutheki kungaba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa" uveza ukuthi lapho inethiwekhi yeselula ingasebenzi khona, iselula ayisebenzi kahle, kanti ucingo lwesatellite luyadingeka. 

Akukho okukhuluma ngokuvinjelwa komugqa we-satellite (okwenzeka esikhethweni 1), noma ngokuthi indawo "iceze kakhulu" (esikhethweni 2), noma ngokusetshenziswa ngaphandle nje (esikhethweni 3). Esinye isigaba sibeka ukuthi ucingo lwe-satellite lusetshenziswa "kaningi yimikhumbi, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcweti, kanye nohambo olunezidingo zedatha nezwi elikude", lokhu kuyiqinisekisa ukuthi ucingo lwesatellite luyasetshenziswa lapho uhambo ludinga okuqukethwe okuthile kwedatha nezwi (isikhethweni 4). 

Ngakho-ke, impendulo eqondile futhi eqondene nencazelo yombuzo nokuthi kunini lapho kungekona ukuhlakanipha ukusebenzisa ucingo lwesatellite kuneselula, isondele kakhulu esigabeni: "Lapho uhambo luzodinga nibe nedata ethile", ngoba kunemisho ephakamisa ukuthi ucingo lwe-satellite lunikeza ukuxhuma okudingekayo uma kudingeka idatha nezwi elikude futhi umuntu kumele akwazi ukuqonda kuphela lapho kunenethiwekhi yeselula engenzeki.

question: Ngokwale ndaba, yimuphi usayizi ongemuhle oveza uhlelo lwefilimu oluvame ukusetshenziswa kakhulu?

Xinxa isifunda esithi amanye amakhamera asebenzisa ifomethi ye-6 x 6 cm (56 x 56 mm), ebizwa ngokunembile, kodwa akusho ukuthi leyo ifomethi ivame kakhulu. Iphutha lokuxoxa ukuthi u-35 mm "kokungekuhle" livela ngendlela yokuthi umbuzo ucelisa usayizi ongemuhle "oveza uhlelo lwefilimu oluvame ukusetshenziswa kakhulu," futhi kuphela u-35 mm ophendula lesi sicelo "oluvame ukusetshenziswa kakhulu."

question: Yini okutholwe yi-ACMA mayelana neBig Brother?

question: Ngokwale ndaba, yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungeke kukhuthazwe esilinganisweni semali yokuvakasha?

question: Zikhanya kuphi izinsika zokukhanya ezicwebezelayo?
answer_list: Lapho kuhlolwe ukuba kube khona indiza yokuqala
reasoning:
Umusho othi "Imisebe yokukhanya emibili yanyuka ukuze ibheke emkhathini" usitshela ukuthi izinsika zokukhanya ezicwebezelayo ziyakhanya zikhuphuka zibheke phezulu ezulwini (emkhathini). Leli  gama "emkhathini" lisikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi izinsika zokukhanya zikhanya phezulu ngasemkhathini, hhayi emhlabeni noma kwenye indawo. Noma kunjalo, azisho ukuthi zikhanya ebusweni bomhlaba noma kunoma iyiphi indawo engaphandle. Lokhu kuqondana nenketho ethi "Ngasesibhakabhakeni," ngoba esibhakabhakeni kusho phezulu ezulwini noma emkhathini lapho izinsika ezibheke khona ukukhanya.

Amanye ama-option awahambisani nalokho okushiwo lesi sigwebo:
- "Ngaphesheya kwedolobha" akuchazi ukuthi zikhanya kuphi kodwa kusho indawo eyinqaba.
- "Lapho kuhlolwe ukuba kube khona indiza yokuqala" akuhambisani nendawo yokukhanya kwensika.
- "Phakathi nendawo yepaki lesikhumbuzo" kuchaza indawo yomhlaba, kepha umusho umele ukuthi imisebe inyuka ibheke phezulu, hhayi ukuthi ikhanya emhlabeni.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kakhulu ngesisho esivela embhalweni ukuthi kuphi ukukhanya kwezinsika, ithi zikhanya "Ngasesibhakabhakeni" – okukhipha isisho sokuthi ukukhanya kukhanya phezulu emkhathini/esibhakabhakeni.

question: Ngokwale ndaba, uma umkhumbi uhamba ehlobo, yini okufuneka bakwazi ukuyigwema?
reasoning:
Umbuzo ubuza ukuthi uma umkhumbi uhamba ehlobo yini okufanele kugwemwe. Kodwa-ke, umbhalo usizeka imininingwane ethile ngokuqondene nokuqonda ukuthi kumele kugwemeke ini ehlobo; le ndaba ikhuluma kakhulu ngokuhamba ngomkhumbi eNyakatho Baltic ebusika, ikakhulukazi izinkinga zokuhamba eqhweni nokuthi abantu abathintekayo bangase babe nezinkinga emakhaleni.

Umusho othi "Uma unqamula iNyakatho Baltic ebusika, bheka ukuthi ikuphi indawo yokusandlwana okwakhiwe ngezingodo, njengoba ukuhamba eqhweni kubangela ukungaphatheki kahle emakhaleni kulaba abathinteke kakhulu" ugcizelela ukuthi ukudlula eqhweni kuyinkinga ebusika, hhayi ehlobo.

Ngakho-ke njengoba umbuzo uthi ehlobo (hhayi ebusika), futhi akukho okuthile okuvezwa kuphi okudingeka kugwemwe lapho umkhumbi uhamba ehlobo, impendulo egqame kakhulu ukuthi "ukuqapha ukuhamba eqhweni", okuyinto ebhekene kakhulu nobusika, akudingeki ehlobo ngakho kufanele ikugcine ingaqinisekile.

Zonke ezinye izinketho azihambelani nezinga olelwe umbuzo (ukuhamba eqhweni kuvika ebusika, izimfuneko ze-visa noma izikhathi edolobheni azihambelani nokugwema okukanye).

Ngakho-ke indlela engcono kakhulu ukumisa impendulo ukuthi "Ukuhamba eqhweni" kulapho kufakwa khona ukubaluleka kokugwema izinkinga ebusika, okusho ukuthi uma kukhulunywa ngohlobo lokugwema, ikakhulukazi uma kukhulunywa ngokuhamba kwehlobo, okumele kugwemwe yikho ukuhamba eqhweni okungavela ebusika.

question: Ngemva kokuvuka ngenhloso phakathi nesikhathi sokulala, ikuphi okulandelayo okuzophazamisa isimiso sokulala?

reasoning:
Umusho othi "Lokhu kungenziwa kalula ngokusebenzisa iwashi elikhalayo elikhalela phansi uma kulinganiswa ukuze likusangulukise ngaphandle kokukuphaphamisa ngokugcwele" ukhombisa ukuthi ukusethwa kwe-alamu elikhalayo ephezu kwetafula kungaphazamisa isimiso sokulala ngoba kukususa ebuthongweni ngaphandle kokuvuka ngokuphelele. Ngaphezu kwalokho, ukuvuka uyophuza amanzi asebhodleni eliphezu kwetafula nakho kubonakala njengezinye izindlela zokuvuka ngemvelo ezingaphazamisa kuphela isimiso sokulala, njengoba kushiwo ukuthi ukuphuza uketshezi oluningi ngaphambi kokulala kungaphoqa umuntu ukuba avuke ayochama, lokhu kungaphazamisa ukulala. Kodwa-ke, ukucisha i-alamu nokubuyela uyokulala ngemva kwemizuzu engamashumi amabili akubhekwa njengophazamiso olukhulu; futhi ukuya endlini yangasese bese ubuyela ekulaleni akubonakali njengephazamisa isimiso sokulala. Ukufunda ihora nenxenye ngaphambi kokulala kubukeka njengento evamile engaphazamisi isimiso sokulala. Ngakho-ke, inketho ethi "Ukucisha i-alamu ephezu kwetafula, nokubuyela uyokulala ngemva kwemizuzu eyi-shumi nambili" iyona engabangela ukuphazamiseka kokulala njengoba kuchaziwe endimeni lapho kukhulunywa ngokusebenzisa iwashi elikhalayo ukuphazamisa ukuhlala kubuthongo.

Kodwa lapha kufanele siqaphele kahle okushiwo encazelweni: "Lokhu kungenziwa kalula ngokusebenzisa iwashi elikhalayo elikhalela phansi uma kulinganiswa ukuze likusangulukise ngaphandle kokukuphaphamisa ngokugcwele," okusho ukuthi i-alamu ivalelwe phansi futhi akuphazamisi ngokugcwele; kodwa-ke, uma i-alamu icishiwe futhi umuntu ebuya uyolala, akuphazamisi njengokuphaphama ngokugcwele. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukuphuza amanzi noma itiye ngaphambi kokulala kungabangela abantu ukuvuka uye endlini yangasese, okuyindlela ephawulekayo yokungaphazamisi ngesikhathi sokulala ngokusebenzisa umjikelezo wemvelo. 

Ngakho-ke, "Ukuya endlini yangasese bese ubuyela ekulaleni" kungaphazamisa isimiso sokulala ngoba kuqukethe ukuvuka isikhashana. Futhi ukuphuza amanzi ngaphambi kokulala nakho kungabangela ukuphazamiseka. Kanti "Ukufunda ihora nenxenye ngaphambi kokulala" akusho ukuba ukuphazamiseka kokulala.

Ngakho-ke inketho yesibili, "Ukuya endlini yangasese bese ubuyela ekulaleni," njengokuphuma ebuthongweni okuvame ukwenzeka ngemva kokuvuka, ivumelana kakhulu nemisho ethi "Uma uzithola usetha kabusha iwashi ube ulele lapho uphethwe ubuthongo, lingabekwa kolunye uhlangothi lwekamelo, okukuphoqa ukuba uphume embhedeni ukuze ulicime." Lezo zindlela zisho ukuphakama nokuya endlini yangasese. Yingakho le nketho iyona ephazamisa isimiso sokulala ngemva kokuvuka phakathi nesikhathi sokulala.

question: Yini eyabangela ukuba iRussia ivale ukusetshenziswa kwe-II-76s?

3. «Amasosha aseSoviet» — ayihlobene nokuqedwa kokusetshenziswa.

question: Ikuphi okulandelayo okungekona icebo lezokuphepha elinikezwe abantu bendawo mayelana nalokho okwenzeke esakhiweni?

"Balekela ukuphefumula intuthu emhlophe" (inketho 3) ayishiwongo ngokusobala njengelocebo lezokuphepha, yize ingase iqondwe ukuthi iyinzuzo.
